title: The Devil You Know
description: Seventeen-year-old Julie Collins has moved to an isolated new world that is as haunting as it is beautiful. She and her mother are spending their final days with Julie’s father as he dies of cancer in his boyhood home. But someone else walks the halls of the old mansion, the ghost of a teenage boy. He appears to Julie and shows her a vision of a ceremony…and a sacrifice. And suddenly, Julie is trapped in a century-old demonic ritual—and only she can stop it.
author: Adrian W. Lilly
